attributes.action: Treat those with dementia the same as other life threatening diseases
attributes.background:
My 84 year old mother has been diagnosed with dementia 
She now has to sell her house to pay for care
If she had another life threatening disease she would get cared for free

rejection.details:
We think this petition is similar:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/254283

You might also like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/260994
